title: abhaya karattai pArta pOdE
sahitya:
abhaya karattai pArta pOdE accam ozhindEn shivanE un


anupallavi

  ubhaya pAdam paTrum anbar uyyak-karuNai peyyum tuyyA


caraNam    kuncita pada nizhalinil iDam koDuttE kOpap-pAsham vIshum kUTrait-taDuttE
anjal anjal enrE shenshilambaDigaL Arkka naTamADum AnandamE un
